SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into partner ( partner_name, mobilephone, introducer, open_id, province, city, area, create_time, update_time, is_del ) values ( #{partnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introducer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now(), 0 )
